product_description: Personalized and sentimental, this luminous pendant necklace is anchored with an initial pendant encrusted with sparkling cubic zirconias.
product_details_and_care:
Personalized and sentimental, this luminous pendant necklace is anchored with an initial pendant encrusted with sparkling cubic zirconias.
16" length; 2" extender; 1/4" drop; 1/4" pendant width
Lobster clasp closure
18k-yellow, 18k-rose gold or rhodium plate/cubic zirconia
